detail_desc: Short, flared skirt in plumeti chiffon with a jersey lining. High waist with covered elastication and a small frill trim.
Two soft bandeau bras in soft jersey with side support and a silicone trim at the top.
Dress in soft, washed denim with embroidery on the front, adjustable straps with a press-stud fastening, a pocket at the top and press-studs at the sides.
Aqua shoes in scuba fabric with a loop front and back, and textured soles.
Pyjamas. Long-sleeved top in waffled cotton jersey. Bottoms in cotton flannel with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.

Sleeveless playsuit in an airy, slightly stretchy cotton weave. Flounce-trimmed shoulder straps that continue down to the waist both front and back, and an opening at the back with a concealed button at the top. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist, diagonal side pockets and short, wide legs.
T-shirt in organic cotton jersey with long raglan sleeves in a contrasting colour and press-studs at the back of the neck.
Lined bikini top with a wrapover front and back, wide elasticated hem and a metal fastener at the back.

Set with earrings and ear cuffs in metal decorated with glass rhinestones and plastic beads. Five earrings, two of which are shaped like snakes. Two ear cuffs that clip onto the ear. The zinc content is recycled.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details. High waist, button fly and sewn-in turn-ups with raw-edge, cut-off hems.

Push-up bra in lace with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and double, crossover elastic straps at the hem.
Top in soft viscose jersey with lace over the shoulders and a rounded hem.
Long cardigan knitted in a soft cotton blend containing some alpaca wool with front pockets, a detachable belt in braided imitation suede and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Cropped, off-the-shoulder top in smocked cotton jersey with short sleeves and overlocked edges.
Sandals in imitation leather with square toes, a foot strap and a narrow, elasticated heel strap. Imitation leather insoles and slim, covered heels.
Short dress in stretch lace with a stand-up collar, concealed zip at the back, long sleeves and raw, scalloped edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Partly lined in jersey.
Tunic in stretch jersey with a sheen. Long sleeves, an adjustable tie belt under the bust and a rounded hem with short slits in the sides.
Ankle boots in imitation suede. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Short-sleeved jersey top with a print motif on the front and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
5-pocket trousers in washed, superstretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs.
Cotton canvas shoes with lacing at the front, rubber toe caps, canvas insoles and rubber soles.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, pockets in the side seams and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fitted strappy top in stretch, ribbed cotton jersey with a V-neck front and back.
High-waisted jeggings in stretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Smocked bikini top with narrow adjustable shoulder straps and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust. No fasteners.
Ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, visible zip at the front, front and back pockets and legs that are flared at the hem.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidery detail on the chest and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
V-neck blouse woven in a patterned viscose blend with buttons down the front and 3/4-length raglan, balloon sleeves with gathers at the shoulders and buttoned cuffs.
Thin metal chain anklets, one with plastic beads and two with metal pendants. Adjustable length 22-25.5 cm.

Set with a zip-through hoodie and pair of trousers in soft, velour. Hoodie with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, frill-trimmed front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with covered elastication at the waist and ribbed hems.
Short shorts woven in a linen blend with a high waist, concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastening and patch pockets. Detachable tie belt at the waist.
Ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh details. High waist and a wide waistband containing a concealed key pocket.
Short dress in mesh with a flock print. Flounce-trimmed yoke at the front, short sleeves with a flounced trim and a flounced trim at the hem. Fitted, sleeveless underdress in jersey.
Trousers in an airy weave with an elasticated waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Small bucket bag in soft imitation leather with an adjustable shoulder strap and drawstring with tassels at the top. One zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 17x23.5x27 cm.

Long-sleeved top in cotton sweatshirt fabric with a double-layered hood, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Decorative, shaping seams at the front and back that continue down the sleeves and a rounded hem with inset ribbing at the front. Slightly longer at the back.

Foldaway waist bag in woven fabric with one large zipped compartment at the front and an adjustable waist strap with a plastic snap lock. One zipped inner compartment into which the bag can be easily folded and enclosed, and a practical carry strap for when the bag is folded up. Size 5x18x32 cm. Size when folded up 3x11.5x15.5 cm.
Elasticated hairband with fabric flowers and shimmering metallic leaves.
Blouse in a patterned weave with a V-neck and drawstring at the front. Short, flounced sleeves and a flounced hem.
Shirt in a linen and cotton weave with a grandad collar, buttons down the front and a chest pocket. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.
Top in crinkled chiffon with cut-out shoulder sections and a transparent yoke that is in a double layer at the bottom. Opening and button at the back of the neck and long, gathered sleeves.
Nylon gym bag with a contrasting colour drawstring at the top. Can be carried as a backpack. Size 35x45 cm.
Playsuit in an airy weave with a V-neck and wrapover front with a concealed press-stud. Elasticated seam at the waist, short cap sleeves and short, wide legs with lace-trimmed hems. Jersey lining.
Short, A-line skirt in a sturdy, textured weave with a high waist and concealed zip at the back. Satin inner skirt.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in ribbed fast-drying functional fabric made from recycled polyester with a racer back and rounded hem.

Short blouse in an airy, textured weave with a narrow, rounded collar and ties at the neck. Buttons down the front, a lace frill at the top that continues over the shoulders, and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs with a scalloped lace trim.

Long, sleeveless dress in softly draping satin. Narrow cut at the top with pleats and short shoulder straps. Small opening at the front with a button at the top, a narrow tie belt at the waist and slits in the sides. Lined. The polyester content of the outer fabric of the dress is partly recycled.
5-pocket trousers in stretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.

Trousers in stretch cotton corduroy with a hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly and concealed button. Diagonal side pockets and welt pockets with a button at the back. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Hipster briefs in soft cotton jersey with lace trims at the back, a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif in a relaxed fit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, ties at the sides and medium coverage at the back.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, and narrow hems.
Fine-knit tights with an elasticated waist.

Blouse in an airy, weave with a V-neck, buttons and pin-tucks down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back, short, flounced sleeves and a rounded hem. Unlined. The polyester content of the blouse is partly recycled.
Prolong the life of your favourite clothes. Mend, patch and continue to wear them. The patches can be ironed onto garments.
Short-sleeved, V-neck top in a soft modal weave with flounces at the top and on the sleeves. Straight-cut style with overlocked edges.
Calf-length dress in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Detachable belt at the waist. Unlined.

Hi-tops in waterproof functional fabric with imitation leather details, a padded top edge, elasticated lacing and a hook and loop fastening at the front. Lightly padded tongue that can easily be pulled forward to make it easier to put the hi-tops on. Reflective details. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky soles.

Lined triangle bikini top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that can be fastened in different ways at the back and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Metal fastener at the back.
Small elasticated scrunchies in various designs.
Sleeveless playsuit in a soft, patterned viscose weave with narrow shoulder straps and elastication with a flounce at the top. Elasticated seam and a bow at the waist, and side pockets.
Fine-knit ankle socks in a cotton blend with wide elastication at the top.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a V-neck, low dropped shoulders and roll edges at the cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.
Long-sleeved dress in woven fabric with a round neckline, an opening and button at the back of the neck and a smocked seam at the waist. Unlined.
Short-sleeved dress in a crêpe weave with a rubber print, scalloped edges around the sleeves and hem, and a concealed zip at the back. Unlined.
Baby Exclusive. Puff shorts in a soft, organic cotton weave with elastication and a twisted drawstring at the waist and narrow elastication around the hems.
Fully-fashioned trainer boots with fabric linings and insoles and chunky, patterned soles.
Long-sleeved jumper in a fine, printed knit with slits in the sides.
Sandals with straps at the front and a wrapover ankle strap with an adjustable fastener. Imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 6.5 cm.
Short, fitted dress in jersey with a cut-out section at the back and long sleeves. Unlined.
Bikini with an all-over print. Top with narrow shoulder straps and frills at the top. Bottoms with frills and a lined gusset.
Set with a knitted hooded jacket and trousers in soft thermal fleece. Jacket with a pile-lined hood and ears at the top. Trousers with wide jersey ribbing at the waist.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline.

Zip-through hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton and recycled polyester blend with a soft brushed inside. Jersey-lined hood, a zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Coat in faux fur made partly from recycled polyester. Concealed fastening with sturdy hooks and eyes at the front, concealed pockets in the side seams and a tie belt at the waist in imitation leather made from water-based polyurethane. Lining made from recycled polyester.
5-pocket jeans in washed, superstretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.

T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.
